article: As a child, I was told that a wise person is the one who learns from everyone. It is a great way to live by this  _  ----One begins to look at people very  _  and he no longer puts others  _  in order to feel good about himself. Except for  "espaciba" which means thanks, I don't know much else.  _  I decided to smile at my every attempt to  _  and ask for information that would  _  me to an ATM and a coffee shop.
